- "Best USDC yields" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?token=USDC
- "USDC yields on Base" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?token=USDC&chain=Base

- "High APY staking" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?poolTypes=Staking&minApy=10
